attributes.comment:
I am writing regarding USCIS-2006-0044 and the drastic increases this would
cause for families adopting internationally. These changes would increase the
already large costs dramatically for families, already facing the expense of many
thousands of dollars to provide a child with a home. While I understand the
government's need to increase revenue with today's deficit, please reconsider
using this means to increase income. It is extremely punitive to families trying to
adopt, especially as they may often have to pay the fee twice because of delays
during the paperwork process. Please consider families like ours in deciding on
this proposal and do not increase the fees so drastically. Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Nancy Johnson
